readme_content:
# Hi there 👋, I'm VIVEK K J ![](/Linkedin%20Banner.png) #### An ambitious Software Developer from India 👩🏻‍💻 🇮🇳 I am Vivek K J, From Kerala, India. I am a self-taught web developer and a programmer who consider myself as a free software enthusiast. I always believe and supports FOSS projects because of their freedom and reliability. I am a GNU/Linux user and believes in Free Software freedoms and free software principles. I've contributed to many open-source projects like Wikipedia, Debian, SMC, etc. - 🔭 I’m currently working on so many things - 🌱 I’m currently mastering Vue.js and React Native - 💬 Ask me about ReactJS, React Native, Firebase,Javascript, Python, GNU/Linux - 📫 How to reach me: @iamvivekkj on Telegram or mail me at contact@vivekkj.in - 😄 Pronouns: He/Him - ⚡ Fun fact: The Firefox logo isn't a fox :) ## Connect with Me 🔗 [](https://github.com/vivekkj123) [](https://www.linkedin.com/in/iamvivekkj) [](https://www.facebook.com/iamvivekkj) [](https://www.instagram.com/iamvivekkj/) [](https://twitter.com/iamvivekkj) [](https://www.vivekkj.codes) [](https://diasp.in/people/c4e6c5c034b60139369b28a1590f75bc) [](https://www.gitlab.com/vivekkj) ## My Skills 🚀 profile_summary:
Here's a concise, SEO-optimized first-person profile description that highlights Vivek K J's strongest technical skills and expertise.

As a self-taught web developer and programmer, I've spent years honing my skills in C, JavaScript, and TypeScript. With a passion for free software and open-source projects, I've contributed to various initiatives like Wikipedia and Debian. I'm currently mastering Vue.js and React Native, and I'm always excited to collaborate on ReactJS, React Native, Firebase, JavaScript, Python, and GNU/Linux projects. With a strong background in web development, I've also built expertise in various tools and technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and more.
